00011 #include "nmea/tok.h"
00012 #include "nmea/sentence.h"
00013 #include "nmea/generate.h"
00014 #include "nmea/units.h"

00016 #include <string.h>

00020 int nmea_gen_GPGGA(char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPGGA *pack)
00021 {
00022     return nmea_printf(buff, buff_sz,
00023         "$GPGGA,%02d%02d%02d.%02d,%07.4f,%C,%07.4f,%C,%1d,%02d,%03.1f,%03.1f,%C,%03.1f,%C,%03.1f,%04d",
00024         pack->utc.hour, pack->utc.min, pack->utc.sec, pack->utc.hsec,
00025         pack->lat, pack->ns, pack->lon, pack->ew,
00026         pack->sig, pack->satinuse, pack->HDOP, pack->elv, pack->elv_units,
00027         pack->diff, pack->diff_units, pack->dgps_age, pack->dgps_sid);
00028 }
00029 
00030 int nmea_gen_GPGSA(char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPGSA *pack)
00031 {
00032     return nmea_printf(buff, buff_sz,
00033         "$GPGSA,%C,%1d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%02d,%03.1f,%03.1f,%03.1f",
00034         pack->fix_mode, pack->fix_type,
00035         pack->sat_prn[0], pack->sat_prn[1], pack->sat_prn[2], pack->sat_prn[3], pack->sat_prn[4], pack->sat_prn[5],
00036         pack->sat_prn[6], pack->sat_prn[7], pack->sat_prn[8], pack->sat_prn[9], pack->sat_prn[10], pack->sat_prn[11],
00037         pack->PDOP, pack->HDOP, pack->VDOP);
00038 }
00039 
00040 int nmea_gen_GPGSV(char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPGSV *pack)
00041 {
00042     return nmea_printf(buff, buff_sz,
00043         "$GPGSV,%1d,%1d,%02d,"
00044         "%02d,%02d,%03d,%02d,"
00045         "%02d,%02d,%03d,%02d,"
00046         "%02d,%02d,%03d,%02d,"
00047         "%02d,%02d,%03d,%02d",
00048         pack->pack_count, pack->pack_index + 1, pack->sat_count,
00049         pack->sat_data[0].id, pack->sat_data[0].elv, pack->sat_data[0].azimuth, pack->sat_data[0].sig,
00050         pack->sat_data[1].id, pack->sat_data[1].elv, pack->sat_data[1].azimuth, pack->sat_data[1].sig,
00051         pack->sat_data[2].id, pack->sat_data[2].elv, pack->sat_data[2].azimuth, pack->sat_data[2].sig,
00052         pack->sat_data[3].id, pack->sat_data[3].elv, pack->sat_data[3].azimuth, pack->sat_data[3].sig);
00053 }
00054 
00055 int nmea_gen_GPRMC(char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPRMC *pack)
00056 {
00057     return nmea_printf(buff, buff_sz,
00058         "$GPRMC,%02d%02d%02d.%02d,%C,%07.4f,%C,%07.4f,%C,%03.1f,%03.1f,%02d%02d%02d,%03.1f,%C,%C",
00059         pack->utc.hour, pack->utc.min, pack->utc.sec, pack->utc.hsec,
00060         pack->status, pack->lat, pack->ns, pack->lon, pack->ew,
00061         pack->speed, pack->direction,
00062         pack->utc.day, pack->utc.mon + 1, pack->utc.year - 100,
00063         pack->declination, pack->declin_ew, pack->mode);
00064 }
00065 
00066 int nmea_gen_GPVTG(char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPVTG *pack)
00067 {
00068     return nmea_printf(buff, buff_sz,
00069         "$GPVTG,%.1f,%C,%.1f,%C,%.1f,%C,%.1f,%C",
00070         pack->dir, pack->dir_t,
00071         pack->dec, pack->dec_m,
00072         pack->spn, pack->spn_n,
00073         pack->spk, pack->spk_k);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void nmea_info2GPGGA(const nmeaINFO *info, nmeaGPGGA *pack)
00077 {
00078     nmea_zero_GPGGA(pack);
00079 
00080     pack->utc = info->utc;
00081     pack->lat = fabs(info->lat);
00082     pack->ns = ((info->lat > 0)?'N':'S');
00083     pack->lon = fabs(info->lon);
00084     pack->ew = ((info->lon > 0)?'E':'W');
00085     pack->sig = info->sig;
00086     pack->satinuse = info->satinfo.inuse;
00087     pack->HDOP = info->HDOP;
00088     pack->elv = info->elv;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void nmea_info2GPGSA(const nmeaINFO *info, nmeaGPGSA *pack)
00092 {
00093     int it;
00094 
00095     nmea_zero_GPGSA(pack);
00096 
00097     pack->fix_type = info->fix;
00098     pack->PDOP = info->PDOP;
00099     pack->HDOP = info->HDOP;
00100     pack->VDOP = info->VDOP;
00101 
00102     for(it = 0; it < NMEA_MAXSAT; ++it)
00103     {
00104         pack->sat_prn[it] =
00105             ((info->satinfo.sat[it].in_use)?info->satinfo.sat[it].id:0);
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 int nmea_gsv_npack(int sat_count)
00110 {
00111     int pack_count = (int)ceil(((double)sat_count) / NMEA_SATINPACK);
00112 
00113     if(0 == pack_count)
00114         pack_count = 1;
00115 
00116     return pack_count;
00117 }
00118 
00119 void nmea_info2GPGSV(const nmeaINFO *info, nmeaGPGSV *pack, int pack_idx)
00120 {
00121     int sit, pit;
00122 
00123     nmea_zero_GPGSV(pack);
00124 
00125     pack->sat_count = (info->satinfo.inview <= NMEA_MAXSAT)?info->satinfo.inview:NMEA_MAXSAT;
00126     pack->pack_count = nmea_gsv_npack(pack->sat_count);
00127 
00128     if(pack->pack_count == 0)
00129         pack->pack_count = 1;
00130 
00131     if(pack_idx >= pack->pack_count)
00132         pack->pack_index = pack_idx % pack->pack_count;
00133     else
00134         pack->pack_index = pack_idx;
00135 
00136     for(pit = 0, sit = pack->pack_index * NMEA_SATINPACK; pit < NMEA_SATINPACK; ++pit, ++sit)
00137         pack->sat_data[pit] = info->satinfo.sat[sit];
00138 }
00139 
00140 void nmea_info2GPRMC(const nmeaINFO *info, nmeaGPRMC *pack)
00141 {
00142     nmea_zero_GPRMC(pack);
00143 
00144     pack->utc = info->utc;
00145     pack->status = ((info->sig > 0)?'A':'V');
00146     pack->lat = fabs(info->lat);
00147     pack->ns = ((info->lat > 0)?'N':'S');
00148     pack->lon = fabs(info->lon);
00149     pack->ew = ((info->lon > 0)?'E':'W');
00150     pack->speed = info->speed / NMEA_TUD_KNOTS;
00151     pack->direction = info->direction;
00152     pack->declination = info->declination;
00153     pack->declin_ew = 'E';
00154     pack->mode = ((info->sig > 0)?'A':'N');
00155 }
00156 
00157 void nmea_info2GPVTG(const nmeaINFO *info, nmeaGPVTG *pack)
00158 {
00159     nmea_zero_GPVTG(pack);
00160 
00161     pack->dir = info->direction;
00162     pack->dec = info->declination;
00163     pack->spn = info->speed / NMEA_TUD_KNOTS;
00164     pack->spk = info->speed;
00165 }
00166 
00167 int nmea_generate(
00168     char *buff, int buff_sz,
00169     const nmeaINFO *info,
00170     int generate_mask
00171     )
00172 {
00173     int gen_count = 0, gsv_it, gsv_count;
00174     int pack_mask = generate_mask;
00175 
00176     nmeaGPGGA gga;
00177     nmeaGPGSA gsa;
00178     nmeaGPGSV gsv;
00179     nmeaGPRMC rmc;
00180     nmeaGPVTG vtg;
00181 
00182     if(!buff)
00183         return 0;
00184 
00185     while(pack_mask)
00186     {
00187         if(pack_mask & GPGGA)
00188         {
00189             nmea_info2GPGGA(info, &gga);
00190             gen_count += nmea_gen_GPGGA(buff + gen_count, buff_sz - gen_count, &gga);
00191             pack_mask &= ~GPGGA;
00192         }
00193         else if(pack_mask & GPGSA)
00194         {
00195             nmea_info2GPGSA(info, &gsa);
00196             gen_count += nmea_gen_GPGSA(buff + gen_count, buff_sz - gen_count, &gsa);
00197             pack_mask &= ~GPGSA;
00198         }
00199         else if(pack_mask & GPGSV)
00200         {
00201             gsv_count = nmea_gsv_npack(info->satinfo.inview);
00202             for(gsv_it = 0; gsv_it < gsv_count && buff_sz - gen_count > 0; ++gsv_it)
00203             {
00204                 nmea_info2GPGSV(info, &gsv, gsv_it);
00205                 gen_count += nmea_gen_GPGSV(buff + gen_count, buff_sz - gen_count, &gsv);
00206             }
00207             pack_mask &= ~GPGSV;
00208         }
00209         else if(pack_mask & GPRMC)
00210         {
00211             nmea_info2GPRMC(info, &rmc);
00212             gen_count += nmea_gen_GPRMC(buff + gen_count, buff_sz - gen_count, &rmc);
00213             pack_mask &= ~GPRMC;
00214         }
00215         else if(pack_mask & GPVTG)
00216         {
00217             nmea_info2GPVTG(info, &vtg);
00218             gen_count += nmea_gen_GPVTG(buff + gen_count, buff_sz - gen_count, &vtg);
00219             pack_mask &= ~GPVTG;
00220         }
00221         else
00222             break;
00223 
00224         if(buff_sz - gen_count <= 0)
00225             break;
00226     }
00227 
00228     return gen_count;
00229 }
Generated on Fri Apr 13 2012 14:55:48 for NMEA by  1.7.4
